vote.title: To authorize the Board of Health to enter into a contract with The Ohio State University on behalf of its Wexner Medical Center, Department of Internal Medicine, Division of Infectious Diseases for physician services for the Columbus Public Health Clinics for the period of February 1, 2023 through January 31, 2024; to authorize the expenditure of $62,400.00 from the Health Special Revenue Fund to pay the costs thereof; and to declare an emergency.  ($62,400.00).
vote.description: A motion was made by Emmanuel V. Remy, seconded by Rob Dorans, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
